summary: Light Grey Tango color theme based on Morning
name: tango-morning.vim
description:
"tango-morning" is a colorscheme inspired by the "morning" colorscheme by Bram.
The gui colors use the Tango Color palette, while the terminal colors are retained from the "morning" colorscheme.
The "morning" color scheme has problems in displaying diffs, which this theme tries to address, and uses elegant soft shades.

Sample Screenshot :http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/1848/vimtangomorningtheme.png
install_details:
=== Linux  ===
mkdir ~/.vim/colors
cp tango-morning.vim  ~/.vim/colors

=== Windows ===
copy the file tango-morning.vim to vim7x/colors/

=== Usage ===
To use the color scheme, 
:colorscheme tango-morning

versions.release_notes: Fixes for Auto completion dropdown menu, NonText region
